fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.processors.interfaces

Interface ProcessorIntrospectionI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessorIntrospectionConnector, ProcessorIntrospectionInboundPort, ProcessorIntrospectionOutboundPort

    public interface ProcessorIntrospectionI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface ProcessorIntrospectionI gives access to the state information of processors through offered ports of processors.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : January 28, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDefaultFrequency()
      return the default frequency of the processor.
      ProcessorDynamicStateI getDynamicState()
      return the dynamic state of the processor as an instance of ProcessorDynamicStateI.
      int getMaxFrequencyGap()
      return the maximum frequency gap tolerated on this processor.
      int getNumberOfCores()
      return the number of cores on the processor.
      ProcessorStaticStateI getStaticState()
      return the static state of the processor as an instance of ProcessorStaticStateI.
      boolean isAdmissibleFrequency(int frequency)
      return true if frequency>/code> is an admissible frequency for a core on this processor, and false otherwise.
      boolean isCurrentlyPossibleFrequencyForCore(int coreNo, int frequency)
      return true if frequency>/code> is a currently possible frequency for a given core on this processor, and false otherwise.
      boolean isValidCoreNo(int coreNo)
      return true if coreNo is a valid core number on this processor and false otherwise.

                                          int frequency)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception

 post   true                    // no postcondition.
